items.title: Report claims Honor Magic V6 will have the largest battery on a foldable
items.summary: The Honor Magic V5 launched last July shipped with a 6,100 mAh Si/C battery in China, while other markets got the foldable with a 5,820 mAh Si/C battery. Honor hasn't revealed the Magic V6's launch date yet, but some of its specs have already surfaced online, with the latest rumor talking about itsâ€¦

items.title: 'Sorry she was mad about it' - Osaka beats Cirstea
items.summary: Naomi Osaka receives a frosty handshake from Sorana Cirstea after she beat the Romanian to reach the third round of the Australian Open.

items.title: GameStop patches 'infinite money glitch' for Nintendo Switch 2 trade-in â€” crafty YouTuber trades $415 console in for $472 with purchase of pre-owned game multiple times
items.summary: YouTuber RJCmedia exploited a loophole in GameStop's trade-in system that allowed him to get back store credit exceeding the retail value of a Switch 2. He managed to accumulate $150 in trade credit, along with a basically a free console and a bunch of games across a two-day haul. GameStop has now â€¦

items.summary: If you're on the hunt for a new premium monitor, the new Asus ROG Swift OLED PG27AQWP-W could be a winner.

items.title: Aston Villa target Loftus-Cheek - Thursday's gossip
items.summary: Ruben Loftus-Cheek emerges as Aston Villa and Man Utd target, Spurs weigh up Crysencio Summerville move, Liverpool interested in Micky van de Ven and Forest eye Kostas Tsimikas.

items.title: 3D-printed fan-less and pump-less liquid cooler can deliver 600 watts of cooling for data centers â€” passive design provides reusable heat, exceeds project performance expectations by 50%

items.title: Rangers told to pay Dundee around Â£400,000 for Cameron
items.summary: Rangers have been told by an SPFL tribunal to pay Dundee a fee of around Â£400,000 for midfielder Lyall Cameron.

items.title: Nicoll named first British monobob Olympian
items.summary: Welsh athlete Adele Nicoll will be the first British female to compete at a Winter Olympics in monobob at next month's Milan-Cortina Games.

items.title: Wawrinka, 40, joins Djokovic & Cilic in third round
items.summary: Stan Wawrinka wins a marathon five-set thriller against qualifier Arthur Gea, while fellow veterans Novak Djokovic and Marin Cilic advance in straight sets.

items.title: Alien fan builds a better Raspberry Pi cyberdeck â€” The MU/TH/UR of all homages to a classic movie series
items.summary: Powered by the Raspberry Pi Zero 2W, Jeff Merrick's slab of 1970 / 1980s aesthetic screams the "charm" of the worn and broken Alien universe that belies the powerful single board computer within.

items.title: Six English clubs and old foes - all to play for on Champions League final day
items.summary: With the league phase of Champions League almost over, which teams can join Arsenal and Bayern Munich in the top eight?

items.title: Scotland secure first group win against Zimbabwe
items.summary: Scotland secured their first win in Women's T20 World Cup Qualifier Group B by defeating Zimbabwe by five wickets in Nepal.

items.title: ITV extend Prem Rugby broadcast deal until 2028
items.summary: Prem Rugby extend their free-to-air broadcast deal with ITV for a further two years.

items.title: Huawei introduces nova 15 x ROBBi edition
items.summary: Huawei unveiled the nova 15 series last month in China, which includes the nova 15, nova 15 Pro, and nova 15 Ultra. items.title: Players at 'high risk' as tennis chases sun
items.summary: With high temperatures and very high UV levels at the Australian Open, BBC Sport looks at the effects of playing for hours outdoors.

items.title: He has not thrown an NFL pass for two years - now he is one game from the Super Bowl
items.summary: When the Denver Broncos host the New England Patriots on Sunday in the AFC Championship game, it will be with a back-up quarterback who has not thrown an NFL pass for two seasons.

items.title: 'It sucked' - Pegula & Musetti put friendships aside to progress
items.summary: Jessica Pegula says it "sucked" and Lorenzo Musetti admits it "was not easy" as both put friendships aside to crush their doubles partners at the Australian Open.

items.title: Work for 2026 season 'unprecedented' for McLaren
items.summary: McLaren team principal Andrea Stella says the world champions have faced an "unprecedented" amount of work as he looks ahead to the new season.

items.title: Eat & Yap - Arsenal striker Smith answers quickfire questions
items.summary: Arsenal striker and Women's Super League record signing Olivia Smith answers Alex Scott's quickfire questions in BBC Sport's new Eat & Yap series.

items.title: Alex Scott meets Olivia Smith to Eat & Yap about Canada, Jamaica and more
items.summary: In BBC Sport's new Eat & Yap series, Alex Scott meets some of the best WSL players to share the food they love and grew up eating, and talk about life on and off the pitch.

items.title: 'I always wanted to be a mum while doing gymnastics'
items.summary: Gymnast Alice Kinsella, who won Olympic bronze in the team event at Tokyo 2020, speaks to BBC Sport about returning to training after having son Parker in the summer.

items.title: Pioneering gymnast targets rare return to elite competition after baby
items.summary: Olympic bronze medalist Alice Kinsella on her hopes of being the first British artistic gymnast to return to elite competition after childbirth.

items.title: 'Unique' Rogers looks to prove worth for Villa & England
items.summary: Morgan Rogers says he "can be anything" - while the Aston Villa star is talking about his positional flexibility, rather than boasting about his quality, his confidence is well-placed.

items.title: 'Genius' Emery helped me through 'tough period' - Rogers
items.summary: Forward Morgan Rogers opens up on his relationship with "genius" Unai Emery and how the Aston Villa boss helped him through a tough start to this season.

items.title: iQOO 15 Ultra design and colors teased, launch timeline confirmed
items.summary: iQOO has officially teased the iQOO 15 Ultra, its next gaming-focused smartphone, offering a first look at the deviceâ€™s design and colour options while also confirming its launch timeline in China. In a Weibo post, the brand confirmed that the iQOO 15 Ultra will make its debut in China in early Febâ€¦

items.title: Welsh players' body gives bosses 6 February deadline
items.summary: Wales' players have given Welsh rugby bosses a deadline of 6 February to provide clarity on what will happen next season.

items.title: Welsh players' body gives bosses 6 February deadline
items.summary: Wales' players have given Welsh rugby bosses a deadline of 6 February to provide clarity on what will happen next season.

items.title: Sony LinkBuds Clip are here with clip-on design, nine-hour battery life
items.summary: Sony's latest earbuds are the LinkBuds Clip. As the name implies, these are of the clip-on variety, a design that has become more and more popular with earbud makers recently. The main upside of this design is that you can hear your music (or whatever's playing through the buds) as well as your surâ€¦

items.title: Here's how the iQOO 15 Ultra's huge active cooling fan will work
items.summary: The iQOO 15 Ultra is launching soon and it's rumored to boast the biggest active cooling fan ever put into a smartphone. Today the prolific leaker who goes by Digital Chat Station on Weibo has shared the image you can see below, showing a schematic of the device and the fan. The air intake for the â€¦

items.title: 'He came here for these nights' - Wissa inspires Newcastle
items.summary: Eddie Howe says Yoane Wissa came to Newcastle "for these nights" after his first Champions League goal at St James' Park.

items.title: OnePlus 15T camera, screen, and charging details leak
items.summary: The OnePlus 15T is rumored to be launching in March, and today some more details about its screen and cameras have been leaked in China. According to Digital Chat Station on Weibo, the 15T has a 6.32-inch screen with "1.5K" resolution, a 50MP main camera, a 50MP telephoto camera, and a 16MP selfie â€¦

items.title: Slot praises Salah return on important night for both
items.summary: Arne Slot praises the return of Mohamed Salah, with Liverpool's Champions League win in Marseille proving important for both.

items.title: Liverpool top English club in Deloitte Money League
items.summary: Liverpool become the top-earning Premier League club for the first time, according to analysis from financial firm Deloitte.

items.title: How Slot changed Liverpool's shape to pull off Marseille win
items.summary: Match of the Day pundits Stephen Warnock and Steph Houghton look at how a change of shape helped Liverpool secure a Champions League win away at Marseille.

items.title: Juventus advance to knockouts after victory over Benfica
items.summary: Two second-half goals for Juventus confirm their progression in the Champions League with a win over Jose Mourinho's Benfica at the Allianz Stadium.

items.title: Athletic Club edge past Atalanta in five-goal thriller
items.summary: Athletic Club produce a stirring second-half fightback to dent Atalanta's hopes of automatically reaching the last 16 of the Champions League, while boosting their own play-off ambitions.

items.title: Lopez stunner helps Barca win six-goal thriller
items.summary: Fermin Lopez scores twice, including a stunning curling effort, as Barcelona beat Slavia Prague in a six-goal thriller in the Champions League.

items.title: Kane double fires Bayern Munich past  Union SG
items.summary: Harry Kane scores twice and misses a penalty as 10-man Bayern Munich secure their place in the last 16 of the Champions League with a comfortable victory over Union Saint-Gilloise.

items.title: More Google Pixel 10a renders leak
items.summary: We've already seen the upcoming Google Pixel 10a first in CAD-based renders, then in a purportedly official image that got leaked, and today there's a new round of renders to look at. These show the phone from more angles. The design, as you can see once again, is heavily inspired by that of the Piâ€¦

items.title: Salah returns as Liverpool score three to beat Marseille
items.summary: Mohammad Salah returns to the Liverpool starting XI as Liverpool score three goals, including an intelligent Dominik Szoboszlai free kick, to beat Olympique Marseille.

items.title: Chelsea keep top-eight hopes alive with win over Pafos
items.summary: Moises Caicedo's 77th-minute goal keeps Chelsea's hopes of finishing in the Champions League top eight alive after victory of Pafos at Stamford Bridge.

items.title: Newcastle secure last-16 play-off spot after comfortable win over PSV
items.summary: Newcastle United clinch a Champions League last 16 play-off spot following a comfortable 3-0 win over PSV Eindhoven at St James's Park.

items.title: Llorente own goal earns Galatasaray  draw with Atletico
items.summary: An own goal from Atletico Madrid's Marcus Llorente earns Galatasaray a draw after Giuliano Simeone gave the visitors an early lead, as both sides fail to find the net in the second half.

items.title: Qarabag score last-gasp winner to seal comeback win over Frankfurt
items.summary: Qarabag score a dramatic stoppage-time winner to end Eintracht Frankfurt's hopes of reaching the Champions League play-offs and keep their own alive.

items.title: Wissa scores first Newcastle Champions League goal
items.summary: Yoane Wissa capitalises on a PSV mistake to score his first Champions League goal for Newcastle United.

items.title: Kaptein goal sends Chelsea into seventh straight League Cup final
items.summary: Holders Chelsea reach a seventh successive final of the Women's League Cup with a narrow victory over rivals Manchester City at Joie Stadium.

items.title: Spurs beat 10-man Dortmund to ease pressure on Frank
items.summary: Goals from Cristian Romero and Dominic Solanke help Tottenham Hotspur to a comfortable win against Borussia Dortmund, giving manager Thomas Frank a much needed boost.

items.title: Suarez strikes late to give Lisbon win over PSG
items.summary: Sporting Lisbon stun current Champions League holders Paris Saint-Germain with a 2-1 victory. Striker Luis Suarez netted a brace including a 90th-minute winner.

items.title: Mbappe scores twice as Real thrash Monaco
items.summary: Kylian Mbappe scores twice with Jude Bellingham also on target as Real Madrid thrash Monaco in Alvaro Arbeloa's first Champions League game in charge of the Spanish side.

items.title: Arsenal extend perfect Champions League record with victory in Milan
items.summary: Gabriel Jesus scores twice as Arsenal win at Inter Milan to maintain their 100% record in the Champions League.

items.title: Bodo/Glimt humble Man City with stunning home win
items.summary: Kasper Hogh scores twice as Norwegian debutants Bodo/Glimt claim one of the biggest upsets in Champions League history by beating Manchester City 3-1.

items.title: Defeat for 10-player Arsenal as Man Utd reach first League Cup final
items.summary: Manchester United reach the Women's League Cup final for the first time with a narrow 1-0 victory against Arsenal, in a rain-drenched semi-final at Meadow Park.

items.title: New leak suggests iPhone 18 may sport a brighter display
items.summary: The base iPhone 18 is widely rumored to launch in early 2027 with a display similar to that of the current iPhone 17.
